name: CreateMarketingForm
description:
Create a new marketing form in HubSpot.

This tool is used to add a new form to HubSpot's marketing systems. It should be called whenever you need to create a new form for collecting marketing data.

parameters.name: form_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details and fields for the new HubSpot marketing form. Include title, fields, and any necessary properties.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
